com.dhemery.expressing
Class QuietlyTrue

java.lang.Object
  org.hamcrest.BaseMatcher<T>
      org.hamcrest.TypeSafeMatcher<Boolean>
          com.dhemery.expressing.QuietlyTrue
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.hamcrest.Matcher<Boolean>, org.hamcrest.SelfDescribing
public class QuietlyTrue
extends org.hamcrest.TypeSafeMatcher<Boolean>

Quietly evaluates whether a boolean value is true. "Quietly" means that the matcher does not describe itself. This is primarily useful to provide a tacit matcher for Expressive boolean features and samplers.
